name: Priceless
description:
In priceless you play as a business man throughout his adult life, trying to make money and get to work on time.

Inspired by the lack of empathy shown towards others in cities, there are other people you can meet on your way to work. Choosing to help them out might cause you to be a little late, but in the end it might just be worth it. 

Created during the 2018 iThrive Game Jam at RIT

- 1st Place Overall

- Best Narrative
